title: No Girls, Have Enough Boys for Brutal Combat
keywords: frontline combat military war wars insanity brutal danger dangers dangerous soldier soldiers woman women female females man men male males Uncle Sam child children boy boys girl girls helmet helmets pots and pans gender genders discriminate genders gender discrimination sexual discrimination bias biased civil right civil rights equal rights equal opportunity equal opportunities sexism equal opportunity military Cartoonist Group Washington Post Writers Group Philadelphia Daily News
caption: My daughter is not going into the bloody, insane brutality of frontline combat!  That's why I've got sons!!
